job_tasks.phrase: Ontwikkelen en implementeren van GenAI en AI-oplossingen met een focus op LLM's
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the development and implementation of Generative AI and AI solutions, specifically mentioning LLMs, which falls under the core definition of AI modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: Integratie van AI-oplossingen binnen bestaande en nieuwe business processen
job_tasks.justification: Integrating AI solutions into business processes implies adapting and applying models within a functional context, which is part of the modeling lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: Continu verkennen en valideren van de nieuwste AI-technologieën
job_tasks.justification: Exploring and validating new AI technologies directly relates to the research and development aspect of modeling, including evaluating new algorithms and techniques.

job_tasks.phrase: Denk bijvoorbeeld aan Agentic AI, Conversational AI en LLM Chains
job_tasks.justification: These are specific types of AI models and architectures (Agentic AI, Conversational AI, LLM Chains) that the role will work with, fitting under the modeling category.

job_tasks.phrase: Samenwerken met verschillende Agile teams om echte business value te realiseren.
job_tasks.justification: While it mentions collaboration, the context of realizing business value through Agile teams implies the development and integration of AI solutions into software products.

job_tasks.phrase: Denk aan de aansluiting op Customer Journey's en geavanceerde dataplatformen
job_tasks.justification: Connecting to customer journeys and data platforms indicates the software development aspect of integrating AI solutions into existing systems and user-facing processes.

job_tasks.phrase: MVP's die je daadwerkelijk hebt gerealiseerd
job_tasks.justification: Realizing Minimum Viable Products (MVPs) is a direct indication of software development and delivery.

job_tasks.phrase: wij bepalen hoe wij dé digitale pensioenverzekeraar van Nederland gaan worden.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase highlights the team's role in defining the company's digital strategy, which requires understanding the business context and goals.

job_tasks.phrase: om echte business value te realiseren
job_tasks.justification: This directly indicates a focus on understanding and delivering business value through the implemented solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Inspireren van collega's en stakeholders over AI trends en business POC's
job_tasks.justification: Communicating AI trends and Proofs of Concept (POCs) to stakeholders implies translating technical capabilities into business opportunities and understanding business needs.

soft_skills.phrase: Continu verkennen en valideren van de nieuwste AI-technologieën
MVP's die je daadwerkelijk hebt gerealiseerd

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes developing and implementing GenAI solutions, specifically focusing on LLMs, Agentic AI, Conversational AI, and LLM Chains. It also involves integrating these solutions into business processes and realizing MVPs, aligning perfectly with the definition and core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.
